DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate safety , tolerability , pharmacokinetics pharmacodynamics orally administrate DWP05195 healthy male volunteer .
DOC.criteria: Healthy adult male subject age 20 45 year The subject Body weight ≥ 50 kg < 90 kg Body Mass Index ( BMI ) ≥ 19.0 kg/m2 < 27.0 kg/m2 A subject provide write informed consent participate study cooperative regard compliance study relate constraint A Subject judge healthy investigator participate study base screen result ( accord standard reference index update recently ) A subject sign symptom previously diagnose disease respiratory , cardiovascular , endocrinology , liver , kidney , gastrointestinal , hematology , neurology psychology function significant diseases history suspicion current drug abuse alcohol abuse A subject allergic history drug ( prescription drug OTC medication etc . ) A subject receive treatment list drug within specified period prior first dose study medication Within last 1 month : drug food know CYP1A2 inducer inhibitor Within 2 week : Prescribed herbal Nonprescribed medicine Within 3 day : Consumption grapefruit juice/grapefruit contain product orange juice/orange containing product , garlic extract functional food Within 3 day : Consumption alcohol caffeine A subject participate clinical study within last 12 week A subject 400mL blood sample ( whole blood plasma donation , etc . ) within last 12 week A Subject know evidence follow infection drug abuse HIV , HBs , HCV cannabinoid , opioid , amphetamine , cocaine , barbiturate , benzodiazepine Smoker smoking cessation within 1 month exsmoker positive result cotinine test AST ALT great 1.5 time upper limit reference range QTc > 430 msec base screen result Blood pressure : SBP ≥ 140 mmHg , DBP ≤ 85 mmHg A subject judge ineligible investigator participate study reason contain clinical laboratory test
